name: SkyLake Incuvest
overview:
SkyLake Incuvest & Co. (ÐŽÂ°SkyLakeÐŽÂ±) is a principal investment firm in Korea focused on private equity investments in ICT (Information and Communications Technology) industries.

SkyLake makes private equity investments into talented technology companies in Korea well-equipped with superior technology, competitive products and potential for global expansion by leveraging the advanced ICT infrastructures in Korea. SkyLake also invests and acts as a gateway advisor to selected overseas technology companies that want to use Korea as a technology test-bed and develop joint strategic alliances with Korean companies.

SkyLake seeks to realize superior long-term investment returns by ÐŽÂ®Incuvesting InnovationÐŽÐ‡ globally. In addition to our capital injection, SkyLake intensively provides top-quality growth advisory to our portfolio companies for growth acceleration and access to our extensive industry and investment network for their global expansion.

To achieve the above, SkyLake investment and incubation team consists of unique combination of business management and investment experts with significant experience and global networking capabilities.
